Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-6199 affecting package gdk-pixbuf2 for versions less than 2.40.0-7
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-6199 affecting package gdk-pixbuf2 for versions less than 2.40.0-7. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gdk-pixbuf2 is earlier than 2.40.0-7, affected by CVE-2025-6199
